text: this should be possible using hubL if statements

What's the best way to display a unique image per contact in an email? I tried placing an image tag in a personalization token, but even in an HTML block it does not display the image... just the text of the tag. I'm using a drag-and-drop editor.

Have you tried using the `safe` filter? The HTML elements might be auto-escaped in this context.

`{{ contact.under_writer_bio_image | safe }}`
